What it is: A symbolic agreement that formalizes the death of an old self and birth of a new one.
How to use it: Describe what self must end. Ask AI to draft a contract between your old and new identities.
What it changes: Enacts psychological transition through ritual closure.

What it is: Symbolizes your passage from one phase of identity into another.
How to use it: Describe your current transformation. Ask AI to simulate a visa/passport into your next self-state.
What it changes: Legitimizes inner migration and identity fluidity.

What it is: Tallies the gifts and curses inherited from family, culture, or collective myth.
How to use it: Describe your upbringing. Ask AI to generate an itemized symbolic inheritance record.
What it changes: Converts unconscious inheritance into conscious choice.

What it is: Geometrically maps all open psychological loops to close them visually and ritually.
How to use it: List unresolved situations. Ask AI to arrange them into a symbolic shape with closure sequences.
What it changes: Finalizes lingering issues via geometric structure.

What it is: Simulates a trial that you must symbolically pass to enter a new life role.
How to use it: Define the role you seek. Ask AI to construct a symbolic ordeal and passage test.
What it changes: Creates earned transformation through symbolic difficulty.

What it is: Visualizes the dual strands of your self-definition and their symbolic mutability.
How to use it: Describe how you define yourself. Ask AI to diagram your self-DNA with traits and conflicting polarities.
What it changes: Visualizes complexity and updates symbolic genetics.

What it is: Determines which aspects of your identity are possessed by collective narratives.
How to use it: List traits or beliefs. Ask AI to identify which ones are culturally installed or internalized.
What it changes: Restores agency by extracting foreign symbolic programming.

What it is: Identifies past selves or dead narratives still haunting your behavior.
How to use it: Describe repeated behaviors. Ask AI which ghost narrative you’re re-enacting and how to evict it.
What it changes: Ends reanimation of obsolete identity scripts.

What it is: Systematically isolates what you’re actually feeling beneath surface content.
How to use it: Describe your confusion or emotional state. Ask AI to extract and label layered emotional truths.

What it is: Creates a symbolic reflective surface to view parts of self unseen by normal introspection.
How to use it: Describe your desire to see yourself truly. Ask AI to simulate a mythic mirror revealing your unseen sides.
What it changes: Amplifies self-awareness and hidden pattern exposure.
